summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Dearborn Street to Atlantic Street, by constructing wooden sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 155 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
